title: Delta_2020_Validation_Average
description: Model details (10OCT2023) Version 6.3.1 - Model developer: HDR Engineering, Inc.  (Modeling lead: Ric McCallan) - Units: Horizontal and vertical units in US Feet - Horizontal Datum: North American Datum 1983, 2011 adjustment (NAD83 (2011))   - Weighted average validation run for Hurricane Delta 2020 event.  - 2012 existing conditions geometry with calibration regions configured for validation as an average of calibration events.  - Hurricane Gustav, Oct 2015, Aug 2016, May 2017, Hurricane Barry, and Hurricane Laura. - Precipitation, wind, and infiltration included.  - Variable stage boundary conditions included for downstream Gulf boundary. - Flow hydrograph included for the Main Atchafalaya Channel at Simmesport, LA. - Initial timestep based on final timestep of restart simulation.  - 2012 Existing Conditions Geometry - base grid cells 1000x1000, refinement included for streams and other key terrain features.  - Time step controlled by courant condition

input_files.title: prj file
input_files.description: RAS project file which links projects with plans, geometry, and flow files

input_files.title: Model Boundary
input_files.description: The HEC-RAS model boundary spatial extent

input_files.description: unsteady flow file in HDF format
